show.title: Bleed for This
show.sharing_text: हेलो! मैंने कुकू एफएम पर इस शो को सुना और मेरे ख्‍याल से आपको भी पसंद आएगा
show.sharing_text_v2:
हेलो! मैंने Kuku FM (Android)  पर यह शो सुना और मुझे यकीन है कि आपको भी यह जरूर पसंद आएगा। 
https://links.kukufm.com/qZNpme
show.description: Mason Ford, a famous boxer raised by his mother, refuses to take part in a rigged match. In retaliation, wealthy Dylan Stone kidnaps his mother and wife, forcing Mason to face him directly to save them.
show.description_secondary: Mason Ford, a famous boxer raised by his mother, refuses to take part in a rigged match. In retaliation, wealthy Dylan Stone kidnaps his mother and wife, forcing Mason to face him directly to save them.
